Player History
Drafted in 54th round, 862nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off James Patterson (KC)...
Injured on 8/26/2015 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/29/2017 with a Bruised Hip, out for 3 days...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/2017, off Agustin Vega (KC)...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Injured on 5/1/2020 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Houston to Colorado on 5/31/2020 (Going to COL: C Nathan Noguez. Going to HOU: SS John Goldstein, 2B Jesus Sachs)...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Colorado to St. Louis (B) on 7/5/2022 (Going to SLB: C Nathan Noguez. Going to COL: 1B Rico Areytio)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/14/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $1,300,000 per year...
Injured on 4/7/2025 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2026 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/19/2026 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
